tool_description: An API showing all the latest climate change news around India
name: Climate News
title: Climate News

api_list.name: Get all Climate Change News from a particular newspaper
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all Climate Change News in India from a particular newspaper
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-news6.p.rapidapi.com/news/HindustanTimes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-news6.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-news6.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-news6.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all Climate Change News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about Climate Change from all over India.
